comment: Sometimes  all racing lines are not matching with the google photo and are passing  out of the track.It should be a way to manualy calibrate  the ģps racing lines by moving the google maps photo under.

author: Ian Smith
comment: Very easy to use and interpret, the library of tracks and sectors is better than you could expect...a ripper for motos.

author: Carrie-ann Acey
comment: Does not give you a clue how to play so not a clue what to do

author: Oztexs CAGLAR
comment: Brilliant!

author: Mathieu Marquet
comment: Excellent, elle fait l'essentiel et est très précise / pro avec une base de données circuit complète et les partiels / données complètes accessibles pour chaque session! Top!

author: Kimi Janerio
comment: Hi, not sure I like the new layout when driving. I race a Formula Ford, and while racing you have little time to check the dash. I preferred the big RED & GREEN indicators for whether I was up or down in terms of time, it's much easier to see while racing or qualifying. Perhaps you can have a configurable  dash. Thanks D

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: I knew the changes won't be to everybody's liking, so that's why it's fully configurable. There's a button on the timer screen, that allows you to select between Classic, Modern and Custom layouts. If you select the Classic layout, you get the 100% same layout that was before the update.

author: Damon Tan
comment: Tried it for the 1st time today with my bike, chossed correct track and leave it in my full suit. I hv no idea why it record 5km as a lap while my friend has no problem using it.

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: The internal GPS does not work correctly when you have the phone inside your suit. You need either a phone holder or an external Bluetooth GPS. The latter is recommended for improved accuracy anyways.

author: Roxanne Barnett
comment: I compared it with a transponder from the track and it's pretty accurate.

author: Rotem Mantsur
comment: I've been using this software for years now and it is absolutely amazing!!!! I'm racing a 1000cc bike and the difference between this app and the track official lap timer is only 0.01s! My only hope is that they will add a lean angle recorder as well to make it 100% perfect!    *I'm using it with Qstarz BT-Q818XT GPS receiver in order to get accurate lap times.   ******************UPDATE*******************  Unfortunately, after updating the software I realized that they now limit the exported lap times to only 120 seconds in order to force your hand in to buying the pro version. Too bad they've decided to go this way, it's a great way to lose users...

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: It's been like this for 3 years already. Any of the in-app-purchases are enough to unlock exporting, even the cheaper ones.

comment: Awesome app. Great for anyone looking to see how they can get faster
Its a great up.. im sure drug racers will surely loved this.. im going to share this to my friends

author: Christos Drifter
comment: The tool you must have

author: Jacques Blom
comment: What about this product in Gear 3 format.

author: Bradley Davies
comment: Used it for the first time at brands hatch, really good app and easy to use

author: Stephan Blöchlinger
comment: Great app but missing overlay for - turn and straight speeds - turn names
Simple, yet sophisticated

author: d
comment: Very nice.

author: Waldo Swiegers
comment: Brilliant app! I use it in conjunction with a Garmin Glo in my race car. It provides valuable information when testing setup changes! The interface is easy and everything just works the way it should. I love the fact that the data can be exported to Circuit Tools for analysis later on. The only thing I find lacking is the fact that there is no way of selecting more than one session at a time to export directly to Dropbox or email. Some sort of session backup system to a linked Dropbox account would be welcomed as well. I use Dashware to overlay the data on my onboard videos which makes the videos a lot more exciting. Thanks for a great product!

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback! The batch backup is definitely a good idea.

author: James Derbyshire
comment: Brilliant. Great way to get some data logging out of a historic single seater. I did find it was a lot more accurate when I cable tied the phone to the steering wheel vs just leaving it in my race suite pocket, guess 3 layers of fireproofing does mess with the GPS. Will be buying the full version at some point soon.

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: You're absolutely right, a GPS does not work properly when inside the race suit, or elsewhere without direct visibility to sky. An external GPS is always recommended and then the phone can be kept in the pocket.

comment: Great app. Would be good to get a version that can work with the Samsung gear s3. Much better than carrying the phone around in the car while on track.

author: Jorge
comment: Please add some interface for edit files information, colours, etc

author: Ricardo Branco
comment: Only thing I can't find if possible is to change start time for session. When racing it logs the warm up lap as your start, also would be good to allow the clock to start as soon as you move x meters. On my points from using it as a race logger.

author: X GaRY L X
comment: Details, great library, accuracy
Great for trackdays!

author: Jason Hawley
comment: The data analysis tools and presentation in this app are better than anything you would spend $100s on for pro level software.  It's simply outstanding.  The timing app is very good - I wish it was customizable in terms of layout.

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: The customizable timing layout is coming this spring. Just need to get the v5.0 out of the door and start finishing the work already started.

author: Mustafa Akgul
comment: Love this app i use it on my trackdays and its perfect. I upgraded to pro and even better and great customer support
title: Best !

author: Bengt Stenberg
comment: Very good.  Very good value for money. Missing brake  forces and speed for  each individual wheel as well as steering angle. But how to get to these non OBD channels?

author: mark drake
comment: I got a big fast car and this app manages to still keep up with me even if no one else manages too. I can now sell my son to colombians. Thnx for dis
title: Dis is the bestest app eva

author: Jay Choi
comment: Best lap timer app for free. Pretty accurate and very easy to use. I may upgrade to Pro version this season. I love it!

author: Sidu Ponnappa
comment: Using it for 3 years, top notch

author: Hannes Welthagen
comment: App is good, Just want to know when will be able to look at the data on the internet ?

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: Currently you can upload your data to serious-racing.com

author: Donovan Lawrence
comment: It's been a huge part of my growth in going around Killarney race track in Cape Town, South Africa. Enjoy the data straight after my session and later on I export and email the data to myself. Then I use Dashware to overlay the data with my synchronised video. Excellent!
title: Awesome

author: Richard Parke
comment: Doesn't  give imfo for vbox app for android. Does everyone sleep with apple?

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: VBOX app, what are you on about? RaceChrono supports and can be used with VBOX Sport hardware, but is a standalone app, with no connection to apps by other companies.

title: Useless.

author: Andrew Troxell
comment: This app is awesome, and I used it back in October when I went to VIR....BUT IT DELETED ALL MY STUFF RANDOMLY. I can't race for a while, but all my lap data for the 3 sessions I timed that day just randomly disappeared

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: There was a problem with version 4.3.9 and older, which caused Samsung Smart Manager to delete the session folder. The new version moves the content from the old insecure location to the new protected app folder (check for the "Manage content" on the start screen). Unfortunately if the Smart Manager did delete the old folder, the sessions are gone.

comment: Esta bien pensada y es facilí de usar y parametrizar tus circuitos. El desarrollador atiende las peticiones y contesta muy  rápido los correos. Lástima q exportar sea opción de pago y el precio no es bajo.
title: Muy buena

author: kinglou48
comment: I've paid for the unlock but the video overlay dosnt work. I want a refund

reply.author: RaceChrono
reply.content: Please contact RaceChrono support at play-store-support(at)racechrono.com. Probably can give instructions to make it work, or if not then give you refund.

title: I've been ripped off,

author: Μιχάλης Μιχαλούδης
comment: ... regardless os and free! I even used to check the reception quality of gps sensors. It works without middleware with external Bluetooth gps.

author: Ahmad Solihin
comment: Great apps for track day

author: Thomas Grace
comment: Great app for the track.

author: Somerdawn Limited
comment: Excellent app to give you stats on your track time. Still figuring out all it will do
title: Great app
